entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
